Name: Kindergarten secret
About the game: The game ' Kindergarten secret ' tells about children's problems within the framework of a dark story, horror and puzzle. You will immerse yourself in the history of the kindergarten and be able to uncover its secret. You will be able to play for each child, complete twenty unique quests and solve the main mystery of the game. The propagandist and the main character of the game does not remember anything at all, and it is on your shoulders that the duty is assigned to help her remember who she is and what happened. * No assets * Twenty-four endings Interesting story Nostalgia Unique graphics
